info.title: CBX REST API
info.description: This documents describes the REST APIs to access resources provided by CBX Enterprise.

post.description: To create a document with a specific document reference and version.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: item object that needs to be added to the store

get.description: To load a document with a specific document reference and version.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: A specific version of a document. If not provided, the latest version will be returned.

post.description: To save a document with a specific document reference and version.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: item object that needs to be added to the store

post.description: To save_and_confirm a document with a specific document reference and version.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: item object that needs to be added to the store

post.description: To mark_as_{status} a document with a specific document reference and version.
